name: UIImage.SymbolConfiguration
desc: An object that contains the specific font, size, style, and weight attributes to apply to a symbol image.

items.name: init(pointSize: CGFloat)
items.desc: Creates a configuration object with the specified point-size information.

items.name: init(pointSize: CGFloat, weight: UIImage.SymbolWeight)
items.desc: Creates a configuration object with the specified point-size and weight information.

items.name: init(pointSize: CGFloat, weight: UIImage.SymbolWeight, scale: UIImage.SymbolScale)
items.desc: Creates a configuration object with the specified point-size, weight, and scale information.

items.name: init(scale: UIImage.SymbolScale)
items.desc: Creates a configuration object with the specified scale information.

items.name: init(textStyle: UIFont.TextStyle)
items.desc: Creates a configuration object with the specified font text style information.

items.name: init(textStyle: UIFont.TextStyle, scale: UIImage.SymbolScale)
items.desc: Creates a configuration object with the specified font text style and scale information.

items.name: init(weight: UIImage.SymbolWeight)
items.desc: Creates a configuration object with the specified weight information.

items.name: init(font: UIFont)
items.desc: Creates a configuration object with the specified font information.

items.name: init(font: UIFont, scale: UIImage.SymbolScale)
items.desc: Creates a configuration object with the specified font and scale information.

items.name: enum UIImage.SymbolScale
items.desc: Constants that indicate which scale variant of a symbol image to use.

items.name: enum UIImage.SymbolWeight
items.desc: Constants that indicate which weight variant of a symbol image to use.

items.name: init(hierarchicalColor: UIColor)
items.desc: Creates a color configuration with a color scheme that originates from one color.

items.name: init(paletteColors: [UIColor])
items.desc: Creates a color configuration with a color scheme from a palette of multiple colors.

items.name: class func preferringMulticolor() -> Self
items.desc: Creates a color configuration that specifies that the symbol image uses its multicolor variant, if one exists.

items.name: class var unspecified: UIImage.SymbolConfiguration
items.desc: A symbol configuration object that contains unspecified values for all attributes.

items.name: func configurationWithoutPointSizeAndWeight() -> Self
items.desc: Returns a copy of the current symbol configuration object without point-size and weight information.

items.name: func configurationWithoutScale() -> Self
items.desc: Returns a copy of the current symbol configuration object without scale information.

items.name: func configurationWithoutTextStyle() -> Self
items.desc: Returns a copy of the current symbol configuration object without font text style information.

items.name: func configurationWithoutWeight() -> Self
items.desc: Returns a copy of the current symbol configuration object without weight information.

items.name: func isEqual(to: UIImage.SymbolConfiguration?) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the configuration objects are equivalent.
